Source code for catplat.tests.test_workflow_bulk

import os

import pytest
import catplat

from catplat.specifications.bulk import BulkSpecifications
from catplat.workflows.bulk import (BulkStructureWorkflow,
                                    BulkStructureWorkflowBuilder)
from catplat.workflows.slab import SlabWorkflow




[docs]
@pytest.fixture(scope='function')
def pt_bulk_workflow(blueprint_pt, catplat_test_project_settings):
    blueprint_pt.stop_at = BulkStructureWorkflow
    workflows = BulkStructureWorkflow.from_blueprint(blueprint=blueprint_pt,
                                                     project_settings=catplat_test_project_settings)
    assert len(workflows) == 1
    return workflows[0]






[docs]
class TestBulkStructureWorkflow(object):


[docs]
    def test_run_current_stage_errors(self, pt_bulk_workflow, fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager):
        fake_vasp_jobrunner = fake_vasp_jobrunner.copy()
        fake_vasp_jobrunner.complete = False

        workflow = pt_bulk_workflow.copy()
        workflow.run(jobrunner=fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager=queue_manager)
        assert not workflow.is_complete()
        assert len(workflow.child_workflows) == 0

        # Check DB
        db = workflow.database()
        assert len(db.retrieve({'bulk_formula': 'Pt'})) == 2  # relaxed and unrelaxed
        assert len(db.retrieve({'chemsys': 'Pt'})) == 2  # relaxed and unrelaxed

        # Make sure no errors when rerun
        workflow.run(jobrunner=fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager=queue_manager)
        assert not workflow.is_complete()
        assert len(workflow.child_workflows) == 0

        # Check DB
        db = workflow.database()
        assert len(
            db.retrieve({'bulk_formula': 'Pt'})) == 3  # additional entry as all entries are errored, so try again
        assert len(db.retrieve({'chemsys': 'Pt'})) == 3  # additional entry as all entries are errored, so try again





[docs]
    def test_run_current_stage(self, pt_bulk_workflow, fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager):
        workflow = pt_bulk_workflow.copy()
        workflow.run(jobrunner=fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager=queue_manager)
        assert workflow.is_complete()
        assert len(workflow.child_workflows) == 0

        # Make sure no errors when rerun
        workflow.run(jobrunner=fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager=queue_manager)
        assert workflow.is_complete()
        assert len(workflow.child_workflows) == 0

        # Check DB
        db = workflow.database()
        assert len(db.retrieve({'errored': False})) == 2  # relaxed and unrelaxed
        assert len(db.retrieve({'bulk_formula': 'Pt'})) == 2  # relaxed and unrelaxed
        assert len(db.retrieve({'chemsys': 'Pt'})) == 2  # relaxed and unrelaxed





[docs]
    def test_run_current_to_next_stage(self, pt_bulk_workflow, fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager):
        workflow = pt_bulk_workflow.copy()
        workflow.blueprint.stop_at = SlabWorkflow
        workflow.run(jobrunner=fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager=queue_manager)
        assert workflow.is_complete()
        assert len(workflow.child_workflows) == 2

        # Make sure no errors when rerun
        workflow.run(jobrunner=fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager=queue_manager)
        assert workflow.is_complete()
        assert len(workflow.child_workflows) == 2





[docs]
    def test_run_current_to_next_stage_errored(self, pt_bulk_workflow, fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager):
        fake_vasp_jobrunner = fake_vasp_jobrunner.copy()
        fake_vasp_jobrunner.complete = False

        workflow = pt_bulk_workflow.copy()
        workflow.blueprint.stop_at = SlabWorkflow
        workflow.run(jobrunner=fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager=queue_manager)
        assert not workflow.is_complete()
        assert len(workflow.child_workflows) == 0  # doesn't create child workflows as job is errored





[docs]
    def test_use_correct_bulk_for_slab_workflow(self, pt_bulk_workflow, vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager):
        """ Tests for the bug where unoptimized bulk structure was previously used to create the slab"""
        workflow = pt_bulk_workflow.copy()
        workflow.run(jobrunner=vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager=queue_manager)
        assert workflow.is_complete()

        # Set new stop_at so that we create the child workflows
        workflow.blueprint.stop_at = SlabWorkflow
        child_workflows = workflow.child_workflows
        assert len(child_workflows) == 2

        # Would be 2.812 if using the unoptimized bulk
        assert child_workflows[0].atoms.get_distance(0, 1, mic=True) == pytest.approx(2.84, abs=1E-2)





[docs]
    def test_run_current_to_next_stage_PtRh(self, blueprint_pt_rh, fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager,
                                            catplat_test_project_settings):
        blueprint_pt_rh.stop_at = SlabWorkflow
        bulk_workflow = BulkStructureWorkflow.from_blueprint(blueprint=blueprint_pt_rh,
                                                             project_settings=catplat_test_project_settings)

        assert len(bulk_workflow) == 1

        bulk_workflow = bulk_workflow[0]
        bulk_workflow.run(jobrunner=fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager=queue_manager)
        assert bulk_workflow.is_complete()

        # two terminations, both classified as 'Pt-Rh'
        assert len(bulk_workflow.child_workflows) == 1

        # Make sure no errors when rerun
        bulk_workflow.run(jobrunner=fake_vasp_jobrunner, queue_manager=queue_manager)
        assert bulk_workflow.is_complete()
        assert len(bulk_workflow.child_workflows) == 1

        entries = bulk_workflow.database().retrieve({'bulk_formula': blueprint_pt_rh.query_set.bulk.bulk_formula[0]})
        assert len(entries) == 6

class TestBulkWorkflowBuilder(object):



[docs]
    def test_own_query_db_criteria(self, blueprint_pt, catplat_test_project_settings):
        bulk_specs = BulkSpecifications.from_attr(chemsys='Cu')
        builder = BulkStructureWorkflowBuilder(blueprint=blueprint_pt, bulk_specs=bulk_specs,
                                               project_settings=catplat_test_project_settings)
        query_criteria_dict = builder.own_query_db_criteria()
        assert query_criteria_dict['chemsys'] == 'Cu'





[docs]
    def test_build(self, blueprint_pt, catplat_test_project_settings):
        """ Test building pure system workflows. """
        bulk_specs = BulkSpecifications.from_attr(chemsys='Cu')
        builder = BulkStructureWorkflowBuilder(blueprint=blueprint_pt, bulk_specs=bulk_specs,
                                               project_settings=catplat_test_project_settings)

        workflows = builder.build()
        assert len(workflows) == 1





[docs]
    def test_build_alloy(self, blueprint_pt, catplat_test_project_settings):
        """ Test building alloy workflows. """
        bulk_specs = BulkSpecifications.from_attr(chemsys='Cu-Pt', e_above_hull='<0.05', bulk_formula='Cu3Pt')

        builder = BulkStructureWorkflowBuilder(blueprint=blueprint_pt, bulk_specs=bulk_specs,
                                               project_settings=catplat_test_project_settings)

        workflows = builder.build()
        assert len(workflows) == 1





[docs]
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('e_above_hull, expected', (('<0.05', 5), ('<0.001', 1), (0.0, 1), (0, 1)))
    def test_build_e_above_hull(self, blueprint_pt, catplat_test_project_settings, e_above_hull, expected):
        """ Test sieving of structures by e_above_hull. """
        bulk_specs = BulkSpecifications.from_attr(chemsys='Cu', e_above_hull=e_above_hull)
        builder = BulkStructureWorkflowBuilder(blueprint=blueprint_pt, bulk_specs=bulk_specs,
                                               project_settings=catplat_test_project_settings)

        workflows = builder.build()
        assert len(workflows) == expected





[docs]
    @pytest.mark.parametrize('spacegroup, expected', ((None, 3), (225, 1)))
    def test_build_specify_spacegroup(self, blueprint_pt, catplat_test_project_settings, spacegroup, expected):
        """ Test sieving of structures by spacegroup. """
        bulk_specs = BulkSpecifications.from_attr(chemsys='Ag', e_above_hull='<0.01', spacegroup=spacegroup)
        builder = BulkStructureWorkflowBuilder(blueprint=blueprint_pt, bulk_specs=bulk_specs,
                                               project_settings=catplat_test_project_settings)

        workflows = builder.build()
        assert len(workflows) == expected





[docs]
    def test_read_bulk(self, blueprint_pt, catplat_test_project_settings):
        """ Read bulk structure from user. """
        bulk_specs = BulkSpecifications.from_attr(bulk_atoms='valid_bulk')

        builder = BulkStructureWorkflowBuilder(blueprint=blueprint_pt, bulk_specs=bulk_specs,
                                               project_settings=catplat_test_project_settings)
        workflows = builder.build()
        assert len(workflows) == 1

        builder = BulkStructureWorkflowBuilder(blueprint=blueprint_pt, bulk_specs=bulk_specs,
                                               project_settings=catplat_test_project_settings, query_only=True)





[docs]
    def test_attributes_mp(self, blueprint_pt, catplat_test_project_settings):
        """ Test bulk attributes for MP bulk structure. """
        bulk_specs = BulkSpecifications.from_attr(mpid='mp-30')

        builder = BulkStructureWorkflowBuilder(blueprint=blueprint_pt, bulk_specs=bulk_specs,
                                               project_settings=catplat_test_project_settings)
        workflows = builder.build()
        assert len(workflows) == 1
        db = workflows[0].database()
        attributes = db.retrieve_all()[0].attributes

        assert attributes.relaxed is attributes.errored is attributes.ignored is False
        assert attributes.workflow_type == 'bulk'
        assert attributes.version == catplat.__version__
        assert attributes.session_id is not None
        assert attributes.date is not None
        assert attributes.bulk_atoms is None
        assert attributes.spacegroup == 225
        assert attributes.e_above_hull == 0
        assert attributes.bulk_formula == 'Cu'
        assert attributes.chemsys == 'Cu'
        assert attributes.mpid == 'mp-30'
        assert attributes.bulk_provenance == 'mp-bulk'
        assert attributes.bulk_formula == 'Cu'





[docs]
    def test_attributes_user_bulk(self, blueprint_pt, catplat_test_project_settings):
        """ Test bulk attributes for user bulk structure. """
        bulk_specs = BulkSpecifications.from_attr(bulk_atoms='valid_bulk')

        builder = BulkStructureWorkflowBuilder(blueprint=blueprint_pt, bulk_specs=bulk_specs,
                                               project_settings=catplat_test_project_settings)
        workflows = builder.build()
        assert len(workflows) == 1
        db = workflows[0].database()
        attributes = db.retrieve_all()[0].attributes

        assert attributes.relaxed is attributes.errored is attributes.ignored is False
        assert attributes.workflow_type == 'bulk'
        assert attributes.version == catplat.__version__
        assert attributes.session_id is not None
        assert attributes.date is not None
        assert attributes.e_above_hull is None
        assert attributes.mpid is None
        assert attributes.bulk_atoms == 'ceabab379d7a6a3f4ff9a01e602f8b10'
        assert attributes.spacegroup == 225
        assert attributes.bulk_formula == 'Rh4'
        assert attributes.chemsys == 'Rh'
        assert attributes.bulk_provenance == 'user-bulk'
